definition: a monument/an upright stone tablet/stele/CL:塊|块[kuai4],面[mian4]

sentences.english: A collection of Mongolian epitaphs of Yuan dynasty translated into Mandarin Chinese.
sentences.chinese: 书中所集之碑文均为译自元代蒙古语的公牍。

sentences.english: After recording the location of the cemetery, document the inscriptions on the headstones .
sentences.chinese: 找出墓园的位置后，将墓碑上的碑文记录下来。

sentences.english: The text is damaged, but what remains does not imply the end of time.
sentences.chinese: 碑文已有残缺，但剩余部分并未有对末日的暗示。

sentences.english: The tombstone inscriptions are blurred by a barrel of toppled red paint.
sentences.chinese: 翻倒的红油漆已将碑文染得模糊不清。

sentences.english: Now no longer this inscription ueno park and the symbol of the history of anchor.
sentences.chinese: 现在的上野公园再也没有该碑文和象征历史的锚了。

sentences.english: The three lines of the inscription have been transcribed and interpreted in various ways.
sentences.chinese: 三行碑文被不同方式誊写和诠释。
收藏史前史，雕刻品和碑文。

sentences.english: He chiselled an inscription on the marble.
The biggest stone which sculptured the poem of "A Night Mooring By Maple Bridge".
sentences.chinese: 身后是最大的刻有枫桥夜泊诗句的碑文。

sentences.english: The inscription on the stone tablet has been rubbed away by the hands of countless tourists over the centuries.
sentences.chinese: 石碑上的碑文经过几个世纪被无数游客的手磨光了。

sentences.english: Malone noticed the epitaph on one of the stones, barely legible.
sentences.chinese: 马龙注意到了其中一个墓碑上的碑文，很难看清。

sentences.english: The tourists will be marveled at a dazzling exhibition of their stone inscriptions in the resort.
sentences.chinese: 他们留下的石刻碑文，令游客目不暇接，叹为观止。

sentences.english: Several relic baskets and more than 400 epigraphical records have also been discovered
sentences.chinese: 同时也发现了几个遗物篮子和400多个碑文记录。

definition: a record of events inscribed on a tablet
stele/vertical stone tablet for carved inscriptions
a monument/an upright stone tablet/stele/CL:塊|块[kuai4],面[mian4]
the top part of a tablet
inscribed stone tablet placed in the tomb/memorial inscription on such a tablet
